title: website: Keyboard navigation broken
body:
by **wolfmud**: 
The website for golang.org seems to have been recently updated with a fixed position
header across the top of all pages. However in Firefox - with and without pentadactyl
plugin - and Chrome it is causing issues navigating via the keyboard. Simple page
up/down has stopped working and trying to tab from the header to the main area so page
up/down does work is hit and miss as there is no visible indication of where I have
tabbed to within the menu. Only the search box and main 'The Go Programming Language'
link show any kind of highlight. I just have to remember it's eight tabs - until the
next change :(
